name: The Hateful
description:
THE HATEFUL is a multi-player First person Shooter game where players can create world space and work together with other players in eliminating all the haters.

The player is a flying robot whose single mission is to eliminate

all the Haters. Haters are soldiers infected by the H-virus which makes them

dangerous and Hostile, they will shoot to kill any player they see. Players can 

play with other players by clicking on the room name from the room list which

will spawn them in a world  created by another player. Players can monitor the

statistics of every hater and player in the world. All players need to register

and login before they can create or join a room.
